original_text: But there was a strong tower within the city, and all the men and women and all the leaders of the city fled to it and shut themselves in, and they went up to the roof of the tower.
korean_text: 성읍 중에 견고한 망대가 있으므로 그 성읍 백성의 남녀가 모두 그리로 도망하여 들어가서 문을 잠그고 망대 꼭대기로 올라간지라

sentences.original_text: But there was a strong tower within the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 성 안에 견고한 망대가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and all the men and women and all the leaders of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성의 모든 남자와 여자와 모든 지도자들이

sentences.original_text: fled to it and shut themselves in
sentences.korean_translation: 그리로 도망하여 스스로를 그 안에 가두었으며

sentences.original_text: and they went up to the roof of the tower.
